pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Kinetics Toolkit- **is an online resource for students and researchers** to learn about 3D biomechanical data processing using Python;- **is an open-source Python package** that does (only) the heavy lifting of this processing, so users stay in control of their data.

- Website: https://kineticstoolkit.uqam.ca- Repository for the Python package: https://github.com/felixchenier/kineticstoolkit- Repository for the website: https://github.com/felixchenier/kineticstoolkit_doc
